notices.title: Assignment plan for this module
notices.name: Any Name
notices.description: Assignment 1: Testing, Assignment 2: Agile Methodology, Assignment 3: Coding Skills, Assignment 4: Testing Code, Assignment 5: Coding Improvements and Release

comments.comment: How long will we get to do each assignment?

replies.reply: 1 week, full dates will be released when the assignments are released

notices.title: Arduino Groups
notices.name: Any Name
notices.description: Please submit your arduino groups by this Friday on Moodle

comments.comment: I'm struggling to find a group, do you have a list of students who also do not have a group yet?

replies.reply: A list of all current groups can be found on moodle, please see if you know anyone who is not already listed.

notices.title: On-campus teaching for all April blocks.

replies.reply: Please refer to the University of Warwick guideance on their website

comments.comment: For our Friday study days are we able to work from home during the in-campus block?

notices.title: Moving to online lectures for the 18th February
notices.name: Any Name

comments.comment: Will the lab session be moved to the next module?
